room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: Such a fun time in the Presidents bunker! Will most definitely come again, Tim was great!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: This was a blast! We went in with a group of 4 to the President's Bunker and escaped with 5 minutes to spare. The puzzles were fun, and weren't overly difficult. That being said, our guide, Marquis, was awesome. He provided us little hints and help to get us passed points we were stuck at. Would definitely come back and try the other rooms again!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Chicago
review: Super fun time and Marquis was very kind and helpful! Will absolutely recommend to friends and family.
